name: Grave Danger (itch) (Spectris Games)
description: You are Gerfast, the defender of your kingdom's graveyard. As long as you have served, the graveyard has never been disturbed. Tonight, however, things are different. Something has gone wrong causing ghosts and skeletons to rise from their grave and overrun the graveyard. If they are left alone until sunrise, they could take over the entire kingdom. It is up to you to stop the undead and find what caused them to become restless.
